00050 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00051 {
00052     int mainErr = -1;
00053     QApplication a(argc, argv);
00054 
00055     // Register meta types defined in ofonodbustypes.h"
00056     registerOfonoDbusTypes();
00057 
00058     // DBus Connection systemBus
00059     QDBusError dbusError;
00060     QDBusConnection systemBus = QDBusConnection::systemBus();
00061     if( !systemBus.isConnected() ) {
00062         dbusError = systemBus.lastError();
00063         qDebug() << "Error:" << dbusError.name() << ":" << dbusError.message();
00064         return mainErr;
00065     }
00066 
00067     // Hook StkAgentIfAdaptor and StkAgentService together
00068     StkAgentService * stkAgentService = new StkAgentService();
00069     StkAgentIfAdaptor stkAgentIfAdaptor(stkAgentService);
00070 
00071     // Instanciate proxy for org.ofono.Manager interface
00072     MgrIf mgrIf("org.ofono","/",systemBus,NULL);
00073 
00074     // find org.ofono.SimToolkit interface for all modems
00075     QList<StkIf*> stkIfs = StkOfonoUtils::findSimToolkitInterfaces(systemBus,&mgrIf);
00076     // but use only the first modem
00077     if (stkIfs.isEmpty()) {
00078         qDebug() << "No modem found, exiting";
00079         return mainErr;
00080     }
00081     StkIf *stkIfP = stkIfs.first();
00082 
00083     // Register stkAgentService
00084     QDBusObjectPath stkAgentPath(STK_AGENT_PATH);
00085     if (!systemBus.registerObject(stkAgentPath.path(),stkAgentService)) {
00086         dbusError = systemBus.lastError();
00087         qDebug() << "registerObject Error:" << dbusError.name() << ":" << dbusError.message();
00088         return mainErr;
00089     }
00090     // Register SimToolkitAgent with org.ofono.SimToolkit interface RegisterAgent method
00091     QDBusPendingReply<> stkRegisterCall = stkIfP->RegisterAgent(stkAgentPath);
00092     stkRegisterCall.waitForFinished();
00093     if (stkRegisterCall.isError()) {
00094         dbusError = stkRegisterCall.error();
00095         qDebug() << "RegisterAgent error:" << dbusError.name() << ":" << dbusError.message();
00096         return mainErr;
00097     }
00098 
00099     // SimToolkit main window
00100     StkMainWindow mainWindow(stkIfP);
00101     mainWindow.show();
00102 
00103 /*
00104     // Test all widgets
00105 
00106     QList<QListWidgetItem *> items;
00107     items.append(new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(TEST_PIXMAP), "One item"));
00108     items.append(new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(TEST_PIXMAP), "Another one"));
00109     items.append(new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(TEST_PIXMAP), "One more"));
00110     items.append(new QListWidgetItem(QIcon(TEST_PIXMAP), "A last item"));
00111     StkMenu menu('\0',TEST_STRING,items,NULL);
00112     menu.show();
00113 
00114     StkMessage message(TEST_PIXMAP,TEST_STRING,NULL);
00115     message.show();
00116 
00117     StkYesNo yesno(TEST_PIXMAP,TEST_STRING,NULL);
00118     yesno.show();
00119 
00120     StkPopup popup(TEST_PIXMAP,TEST_STRING,NULL);
00121     popup.show();
00122 
00123     StkInputKey inputkey(TEST_PIXMAP,TEST_STRING,NULL);
00124     inputkey.show();
00125 
00126     StkInputText inputtext(TEST_PIXMAP,TEST_STRING,NULL);
00127     inputtext.show();
00128 */
00129 
00130     mainErr = a.exec();
00131 
00132     stkRegisterCall = stkIfP->UnregisterAgent(stkAgentPath);
00133     stkRegisterCall.waitForFinished();
00134     if (stkRegisterCall.isError()) {
00135         dbusError = stkRegisterCall.error();
00136         qDebug() << "UnregisterAgent error:" << dbusError.name() << ":" << dbusError.message();
00137         return -1;
00138     }
00139 
00140     return mainErr;
00141 }
